content: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.

content: We only part to meet again.

content: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet.

content: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.

content: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.

content: I have stepped off the relationship scene to come to terms with myself. I have spent most of my adult life being 'someone's girlfriend', and now I am happy being single.
author: Penelope Cruz

content: Remember that no relationship is a total waste of time. You can always learn something about yourself.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

content: Men and women are not born inconstant: they are made so by their early amorous experiences.
author: Andre Maurois

content: A sensible woman should be guided by her head when taking a husband, and by her heart when taking a lover.
author: Ninon de L'Enclos

content: When you make his sandwiches, put a sexy or loving note in his lunch box.
author: Anne Rice

content: You are not alone with a guy until you are a proper age. You don't go to certain levels with men until you are married or you have a certain relationship.
author: Daisy Fuentes

content: If you want a love message to be heard, it has got to be sent out. To keep a lamp burning, we have to keep putting oil in it.
author: Mother Teresa

content: It is always the same: women bedeck themselves with jewels and furs, and men with wit and quotations.
author: Maurice Chevalier

content: My wife and I have been together since 1986. I graduated in '86 and she graduated in '88. We began dating when she was 17. Actually she turned 18 when we started kissing and stuff.
author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

content: I was in a relationship with a girl I loved for three years. Where do you go after three years? Then you've got to start thinking about other things, and I'm too young to think about those things.
author: Shia LaBeouf

content: My view is that marriage is a relationship between a man and a woman. That's the position I've had for some time, and I don't intend to make any adjustments at this point... Or ever, by the way.
author: Mitt Romney

content: Absences are a good influence in love and keep it bright and delicate.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

content: I am very sad for men and women trapped in any relationship where there is cruelty, dominance, inequity. I long for the liberation of all people.
author: Jasmine Guy

content: Spiritual relationship is far more precious than physical. Physical relationship divorced from spiritual is body without soul.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: To marry unequally is to suffer equally.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

content: In any relationship, after the first year is over, you can't help but want your own space.
author: Helena Bonham Carter

content: That common cold of the male psyche, fear of commitment.
author: Richard Schickel

content: For the most part, that message hasn't changed a lot over the years - love is still love, and heartbreak is still heartbreak.
author: Casey Kasem

content: I want to be very close to someone I respect and admire and have somebody who feels the same way about me.
author: Richard Bach

content: It isn't necessary to have relatives in Kansas City in order to be unhappy.
author: Groucho Marx

content: I don't think it's necessarily healthy to go into relationships as a needy person. Better to go in with a full deck.
author: Anjelica Huston

content: Maybe the most that you can expect from a relationship that goes bad is to come out of it with a few good songs.
author: Marianne Faithfull

content: You show your vulnerability through relationships, and those feelings are your soft spot. You need to have a soft spot.
author: Victoria Pratt

content: It is only when we no longer compulsively need someone that we can have a real relationship with them.
author: Anthony Storr

content: It is almost always a fault of one who loves not to realize when he ceases to be loved.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

content: Caresses, expressions of one sort or another, are necessary to the life of the affections as leaves are to the life of a tree. If they are wholly restrained, love will die at the roots.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

content: When one has love for God, one doesn't feel any physical attraction to wife, children, relatives and friends. One retains only compassion for them.
author: Ramakrishna

content: He who lives in our mind is near though he may actually be far away; but he who is not in our heart is far though he may really be nearby.
author: Chanakya

content: No partner in a love relationship... should feel that he has to give up an essential part of himself to make it viable.
author: May Sarton

content: I don't even like to use the word relationship. I don't know what it means.
author: Ron Silver

content: In a relationship you have to open yourself up.
author: Neil LaBute

content: Caesar might have married Cleopatra, but he had a wife at home. There's always something.
author: Will Cuppy

content: I love my mom. My mom loves me. We don't have an easy relationship. I don't think we ever will, but I'd rather have a complicated, misunderstood relationship than have no relationship at all.
author: Tori Spelling

content: When you start falling for somebody and you can't stop thinking about when you're going to see them again, I love that. Women are beautiful. They deserve to be cherished and respected.
author: Orlando Bloom

content: Women won't let me stay single and I won't let me stay married.
author: Errol Flynn

content: I am not gay; I don't have a relationship with Ricky Martin.
author: Maluma

content: I think for any relationship to be successful, there needs to be loving communication, appreciation, and understanding.
author: Miranda Kerr

content: The most important thing is to have a good relationship with the bike... you have to understand what she wants. I think of a motorcycle as a woman, and I know that sounds silly, but it's true.
author: Valentino Rossi

content: I grew up with a pet iguana named Willy. We had a very contentious relationship. It turns out that iguanas are not meant to live in suburban homes.
author: Kate McKinnon

content: What if every relationship you've ever been in, is someone slowly figuring out they didn't like you as much as they hoped they would?
author: James Acaster

content: The better you know yourself, the better your relationship with the rest of the world.
author: Toni Collette

content: I believe forgiveness is the best form of love in any relationship. It takes a strong person to say they're sorry and an even stronger person to forgive.
author: Yolanda Hadid

content: If I get married in the future, I want to have a relationship like friends with my other half. It'd be best if we can communicate often.
author: Lee Min-ho

content: I am single and not looking to be in a relationship.
author: Chris Evans
